alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:09AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Bellevue LD12. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, Water affects access to trailer park at Mill Creek in Bellevue. Water affects lowest homes in Sabula. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued later tonight.
